title: Shopping & Restaurants: Farewell to Customers (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Farewell to Customers subcategory within Shopping & Restaurants. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: We look forward to seeing you again.
cards.romaji: Mata no go-raiten o machi shite orimasu.
cards.japanese: またのご来店をお待ちしております。
